page.title: 10PETS
page.content:
MOST CHILDREN WOULD LIKE A PET OF THEIR OWN AT SOME TIME. I, FOR INSTANCE, WOULD LOVE A HORSE, BUT WE CANNOT AFFORD TO KEEP IT. IN SCHOOL WE KEEP A LOT OF ANIMALS AND BIRDS AND THOUGH THEY'RE INTERESTING THEY'RE NOT LIKE HAVING A PET OF YOUR OWN. I THOUGHT IT WOULD BE INTERESTING TO DISCOVER HOW MANY PETS THE 213 CHILDREN IN THE SCHOOL HAVE AT HOME AND HERE ARE THE RESULTS:-
DOGS 88 RABBITS 27 CAGE BIRDS 26 CATS 25 FISH 25 GERBILS 7 GUINEA PIGS 6 HAMSTERS 4 FERRETS 3 PIGEONS 2 DUCKS 1 TERRAPINS 1
